name: Paris Bistro Beef Ragout
description: This is a classic beef stew with a French twist!
preparation: In a large bowl, stir together beef, Herb & Garlic Dip Mix, wine, and Beef & Steak Seasoning. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.
Remove beef from marinade and place in a bowl, reserving marinade. Sprinkle beef with flour, and stir to coat.
Brush Wok or a frying pan with oil, and brown meat over medium-high heat for 5-10 minutes.
Stir in reserved marinade and Beef Broth.

Bring to a boil, then transfer to a slow cooker, adding the carrots, potatoes, Salt and Pepper. Turn slow cooker to high, cover, and cook until beef is tender, approximately 1 1⁄2 hours. Add more Bouillon if needed. Stir in mushrooms, if using, for the last 15â€“20 minutes of cooking.
Place stew in a serving bowl. Spoon 1⁄4 cup Paris Bistro Sauce over top and serve the rest on the side.
tips: If you prefer not to use wine in this recipe, simply use the same amount of beef broth instead.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
